O PyLadies √© uma comunidade internacional que apoia mulheres e pessoas de grupos sub-representados que t√™m interesse em programa√ß√£o e tecnologia, especialmente em Python. O cap√≠tulo de Lavras, MG √© um grupo pequeno, cheio de energia e com muita vontade de crescer, e esperamos receber cada vez mais pessoas que queiram aprender, trocar experi√™ncias e se sentir acolhidas na √°rea de tecnologia.

title: PyLadies Lavras
text:
About (English)
PyLadies is an international community supporting women and underrepresented groups interested in programming and technology, especially Python. The Lavras, MG chapter is a small but energetic group, eager to grow and welcome more people who want to learn and feel at home in tech.
As an active member, I help organize events and manage the group‚Äôs social media, handling communication, content creation, and outreach.

text:
About this Project (English)
Exploratory data analysis developed for the Data Organization and Presentation (GES109) course at UFLA. Investigated wildfire patterns in Brazil during May 2025 using open data from INPE, covering biome distribution, drought-fire risk relationship, and geographic patterns by state.

title: CD na Escola
text:
Sobre o Projeto
O Ci√™ncia de Dados na Escola (CD na Escola) √© um projeto educacional que busca aproximar estudantes do ensino b√°sico do pensamento estat√≠stico e da ci√™ncia de dados de forma acess√≠vel e contextualizada, sem exigir conhecimentos t√©cnicos avan√ßados.

title: CD na Escola
text:
About (English)
CD na Escola (Data Science at School) is an educational project that brings statistical thinking and data science to school students in an accessible, contextualized way - inspired by Florence Nightingale‚Äôs pioneering use of data visualization to communicate evidence and drive change.
As a FAPEMIG scholarship holder, I work on developing an educational platform built with Quarto and producing data and technology content adapted for the school context.
Full details coming soon.
